Description: Returns the weight of the sepcified base form.
Name: GetWeight

Description: Returns the base health of the object or calling reference.
Name: GetHealth

Description: Returns the base value of the object or calling reference.
Name: GetValue

Description: Sets the weight of the object.
Name: SetWeight

Description: Sets the base health of the specified base form.
Name: SetHealth

Description: Sets the monetary value of a base object.
Name: SetBaseItemValue

Description: Returns the type of the specified base form.
Name: GetType

Description: Returns the repair list for the inventory object.
Name: GetRepairList

Description: Returns the equipment type of the inventory object.
Name: GetEquipType

Description: Compares the names of two objects and Returns -1 if the first occurs alphabetically before the second, 1 if the first occurs after the second, or 0 for equality. Comparison is case-insensitive.
Name: CompareNames

Description: Sets the name of the object.
Name: SetName

Description: Returns the current health of the calling ref.
Name: GetCurrentHealth

Description: Sets the current health of the calling reference.
Name: SetCurrentHealth

Description: Sets the repair list for the specified item.
Name: SetRepairList

Description: Returns 1 if the object or calling reference is a quest item.
Name: IsQuestItem

Description: Sets whether the specified object or object reference is a quest item.
Name: SetQuestItem

Description: Returns the object effect of the inventory object.
Name: GetObjectEffect

Description: Returns the item assigned to the specified hotkey from 1 to 8.
Name: GetHotkeyItem

Description: Sets the item associated with a hotkey.
Name: SetHotkeyItem

Description: Clears the item associated with the specified hotkey.
Name: ClearHotKey

Description: Returns the base object of the item in the specified slot.
Name: GetEquippedObject

Description: Returns the current health of the object equipped in the specified slot.
Name: GetEquippedCurrentHealth

Description: Sets the current health of the equipped object at the given slot.
Name: SetEquippedCurrentHealth

Description: Returns the number of items contained by the calling ref.
Name: GetNumItems

Description: Returns the base object of the specified index contained in the calling ref.
Name: GetInventoryObject

Description: Returns the armor rating of the specified armor.
Name: GetArmorAR

Description: Returns whether the biped form is considered power armor.
Name: IsPowerArmor

Description: Returns the damage threshold of the armor.
Name: GetArmorDT

Description: Returns whether the specified object is playable or not. Returns true only if the object is of a type which can be flagged as playable in the editor.
Name: IsPlayable

Description: Returns the slots used by the biped form as a bitmask.
The mask is a bitmask that should be built by using ClearBit/SetBit. The order is as defined in GECK in the slot list of an armor, and starts at 0.
Name: GetEquipmentSlotsMask

Description: Returns the flags used by the biped form as a bitmask.
Name: GetEquipmentBipedMask

Description: Sets whether the armor is power armor or not.
Name: SetIsPowerArmor

Description: Sets the armor rating of the armor.
Name: SetArmorAR

Description: Sets the damage threshold of the armor.
Name: SetArmorDT

Description: Specifies whether the object can be used by the player.
Name: SetIsPlayable

Description: Sets the slots used by the biped form from a bitmask.
The mask is a bitmask that should be built by using ClearBit/SetBit. The order is as defined in GECK in the slot list of an armor, and starts at 0.
Name: SetEquipmentSlotsMask

Description: Sets the slots used by the biped form from a bitmask.
The mask is a bitmask that should be built by using ClearBit/SetBit. The order of bit index for slots can be found in NVSE source files (GameForms.h, search for EBipedFlags).
Name: SetEquipmentBipedMask

Description: Returns the speed value of the ammo.

Description: Returns the percentage chance of getting the casing item from the ammo.
Name: GetAmmoConsumedPercent

Description: Returns the casing item given by the ammo.
Name: GetAmmoCasing

Description: Returns the number of rounds in the player's equipped weapon.
Name: GetPlayerCurrentAmmoRounds

Description: Sets the current number of rounds in the clip of the player.
Name: SetPlayerCurrentAmmoRounds

Description: Returns the current ammo in the weapon held by the player.
Name: GetPlayerCurrentAmmo

Description: Clones the specified form and returns a new base form which will not be saved in the save game.
Name: TempCloneForm

Description: Returns whether the specified form is a created object or not.
Name: IsClonedForm

Description: Sets the name of the object based on the format string.
Name: SetNameEx

Description: Adds an item to a container with a specified ownership.
Name: AddItemOwnership

Description: Adds an item to a container at a specified health percentage and with an ownership.
Name: AddItemHealthPercentOwner

Description: Returns a random item in the FormList.
Name: PickOneOf

Description: Equips an item and runs its OnEquip block.
Name: EquipItem2

Description: Equips the calling object on its owner.
Name: EquipMe

Description: Unequips the calling object on its owner.
Name: UnequipMe

Description: Returns 1 if the calling object is currently being worn.
Name: IsEquipped
